column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday September 19 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR MAN O WAR BLVD AT RICHMOND RD:
column4: The inner loop side is shut down at Richmond Rd due to a serious collision just past Richmond Rd.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR MAN O WAR BLVD AT RICHMOND RD:
column4: The inbound left turn lanes of Richmond Rd are also shut down.
